```{r,eval=TRUE,echo=FALSE,results="asis"}
.doc_arg(
    type = paste(
        .doc_type("logical"),
        "or",
        .doc_type("integer")
    ),
    description = c(
        "The amount of information about the",
        .doc_ref(tag = "value"),
        "to be printed.",
        "One of:",
        .doc_tbl(
            rbind(
                c(
                    "`value_level == FALSE` or `value_level <= 0`",
                    "",
                    .doc_fmt_print_what()
                ),
                c(
                    "`0 < value_level`",
                    "",
                    .doc_fmt_print_what(
                        paste(.doc_ref(tag = "value", suffix = "'s"), "first `value_level` characters")
                    )
                ),
                c(
                    "`value_level == TRUE`",
                    "",
                    .doc_fmt_print_what(paste(.doc_ref(tag = "value"), "entirely"))
                )
            ),
            alignment = c("r", "c", "l"),
            width = c(15, 2, 60)
        ),
        ""
    )
)
```
